text: So Mark slept. It was daylight when he woke with Warren 's hand upon his shoulder.

Sir Clifford wants me to find him a new groom , about twenty or twenty-one, who knows his business. His old coachman is getting feeble, and he wants a man to work with him and get into his ways, who would be able, when the old man was pensioned off, to step into his place
The table won't fit through the doorway because it is too wide.
The delivery truck zoomed by the school bus because it was going so slow.
Although they ran at about the same speed, Sue beat Sally because she had such a bad start.
Paul tried to call George on the phone, but he wasn't available.
The foxes are getting in at night and attacking the chickens . They have gotten very nervous.
Bob paid for Charlie 's college education, but now Charlie acts as though it never happened. He is very ungrateful.
The fish ate the worm . It was tasty.

Babar wonders how he can get new clothing. Luckily, a very rich old man who has always been fond of little elephants understands right away that he is longing for a fine suit. As he likes to make people happy, he gives him his wallet.

Although they ran at about the same speed, Sue beat Sally because she had such a good start.
During a game of tag, Ethan chased Luke because he was "it".

Kirilov ceded the presidency to Shatov because he was more popular.

The sack of potatoes had been placed below the bag of flour , so it had to be moved first.

Tatyana knew that Grandma always enjoyed serving an abundance of food to her guests. Now Tatyana watched as Grandma gathered Tatyana 's small mother into a wide, scrawny embrace and then propelled her to the table, lifting her shawl from her shoulders, seating her in the place of honor, and saying simply: "There's plenty."
John hired him self out to Bill to take care of him .
At the Loebner competition the judges couldn't figure out which respondents were the chatbots because they were so advanced.
